programmes.show_description: BBC Radio Ulster joins BBC Radio 5 live.
The day's news agenda set with Sarah Brett and Joel Taggart, including regular news, travel and sport updates and analysis of finance and business news.
Breaking news and hard-hitting talk - Stephen Nolan gets you talking about the big stories of the day.
From the kitchen to the office, the work van and beyond... This is YOUR mid-morning escape, with Vinny & Cate.
The latest national and international news.
Join the conversation on the news stories everyone is talking about. William Crawley debates challenging issues and talks to the people making the headlines.

Spend your afternoon with Connor Phillips with great music, craic and stories to make you smile.
All the day's news and analysis with Richard Morgan. Discussing stories that matter to you and asking the questions you want answered.

Anne-Marie is back live with a healthy helping of hits and hot news. Music from Kiss, Kesha and Kelly Clarkson.
